lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I understand how a small amount can make a big difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Vyonne
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to believe that I could help someone change their life in a positive way because I have been helped by others before.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my patients maintain a healthy mouth by cleaning their teeth and removing germs that could harm all of their body.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: As a single mom, I understand how hard it is for women in this world to get ahead and make something of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent and sell construction equipment.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: "If a man shuts his ears to the cry of the poor, he too will cry out and not be answered."  Prov 21:13.  I believe microloans work, and I want to be a part of giving someone a helping hand.

lenders.name: The Icelander
lenders.loan_because: Those persons having courage to ask for help to make there lives better should be given chance

lenders.name: Annabelle and Dave
lenders.occupation: we work in the arts and in internet video editing

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I wish I had my own business, yet it's great to be a tiny part in helping a sister far away succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am unemployed but I wish could do more to help children have a chance in life and succeed.

lenders.name: Danna
lenders.occupation: Director of Program Management for a CME company
lenders.loan_because: I am first generation "American", so the stuggles of making it in some of these countries is a not too distant part of my heritage.

lenders.name: Kaya and Katy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people achieve their dreams and we want to show them that we love them.
lenders.occupational_info: Kaya is an attorney; and Katy is in 1st Grade.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.  I do not make a lot of money, BUT I know I will spend $25.00 on extras for myself or my husband.  so  that $25.00 is going to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical secretary in Labor and Delivery at a local Hospital.  I process Birth certificates, do newborn hearing tests.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Grammy & Emmy nominated, CMA award winning songwriter, Team Building facilitator & Keynote speaker,

lenders.name: The Sullivan Family
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: “Many small people, in many small places, do many small things, that can alter the face of the world.” ~Anonymous -

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to be a lawyer.

lenders.name: LCG
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people being able to take responsibility for their own life, and have a chance to make their own living.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate. Although I do not have much money by every-day USA standards, my income is quite sufficient for me to live on and enjoy some extra things. I've been sharing much of my life activities with others for many years, and I find that this is a wonderful way to make some of my money do some real good. At my age (77) it's sometimes hard to find activities that one can trust completely. I do trust Kiva, and I hope that Maria soon has enough to fulfill her needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare income tax returns. The income tax law in the U.S. is quite complicated and professionals like myself help others to prepare their tax documents so that they are correct and pay only those taxes that they are required to pay. I also assist people in investing their money.

lenders.name: Logan & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Being teachers we love giving to others.  Giving both the gift of knowledge or others the ability to follow their dream  is what we live and breath each day.  We just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both public school educators.  My wife teaches high school math and I teach elementary art.

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: $25 makes very little impact on our day to day lives, but if it empowers someone in another part of the world not as privileged as ours, it's the least we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide IV therapy to patients in their homes.

lenders.name: Zane
lenders.loan_because: to perpetuate capitalism for those who are less fortunate

lenders.name: Brian, Maritza & kids
lenders.loan_because: it makes such great practical sense to assist the entrepreneur in building a means of  living that will (+) impact both their family and greater community.  A very small price to contribute greatly across the world.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to change someone's life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the sales and marketing of consumer wireless products in 165 stores.

lenders.name: Craig and Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in this simple and powerful way is right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach middle and high school math and science..

lenders.name: William Ty
lenders.loan_because: I did well in the "womb lottery" and was born in this day and age in the U.S....which, yes means I didn't do so well in many fronts, but I was afforded a certain means to education and to income.  I wish to share in my "winnings."
lenders.occupational_info:
Trabajo en un restarante de pescados y mariscos.  El restarante donde trabajo es muy caro.  El trabajo que hago es como cantinero, pero yo abro ostiones y conchas para mis clientes.  Posiblemente, la cosa que es estrano para gente en otro paises es que los clientes comen los mariscos crudos...de veras!  Es muy rico.
Trabajo para una duena simpatica, pero no gana mucho de horario, solamente gana la mayoria de mi plata de propinas.

lenders.name: James Elmer
lenders.loan_because:
I am not wealthy but I have been very blessed. Kiva makes it possible for me to share those blessings and make a difference in someone's life where it would otherwise be very difficult for me to do so. 
My thanks and appreciation to all of you and all you do at Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: For over 33 years I have designed and executed custom embroidery on Theatrical, Circus & Ballet costumes; Rock & Opera stars; draperies, table covers & pillows for Interior Designers; and Collectibles (like my exclusive line of solid sequin Teddy Bears).

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to work hard to help themselves.  I love the concept of social lending and crowd funding to help people achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women feel beautiful and confident by helping them learn to style their lives.  I also coach women on opening their own successful businesses so they can enjoy a fun and flexible lifestyle.

lenders.name: Jamie Ratliff
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who are trying to start or run a business deserve a chance to be successful.  I am honored to be able to help others start or expand their business. Since the US dollar goes a lot further in other parts of the world, it makes it very inexpensive to help others. After all, who cant afford to lend $25 to give someone a chance to make a dramatic change in their life?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer specializing in small business, internet, and search engine optimization.

lenders.name: Nita
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with an amazing loving support system. It is my obligation and joy to pass on support to others
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs and manipulate their texture

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I will help you and you will help someone in need in the future - and so on - as we come to understand that we are ultimately one big community.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently retired after working more then 25 years for the protection of the environment.

lenders.name: marsha
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and I want to help them if only in a small way.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.occupational_info: I work as both a wildlife and nature photographer and a scientist. Some of my photos can be seen at    ...

lenders.name: Steve and Myra
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and we would like a chance to share with others.

lenders.name: Cece
lenders.loan_because: I'm an American....I have so much.  Kiva gives me a chance to share, and make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm working on being the best person I can be.

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying so hard to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in two businesses.  I am an esthetician and massage therapist with one business and a Strategic Analyst with the other.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with mental disabilities.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: This organization is making a difference in supporting entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university courses in psychology, artificial intelligence, marketing, and what it is like to participate in war.  I'm very fortunate in that I basically teach what I'm interested in.  I also run a publishing business (books of interest for people over age 60).

lenders.name: Sungho
lenders.loan_because: I would like to do something that I can help people improve their business and life. I also want to be a lender.
lenders.occupational_info: The most of my work is to create my software architecture designs and patterns. have a fun and relax ..

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.occupation: Care Coordinator with Adolescents and their famili

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I am a mother and grandmother.  I think women should help other women.  I think it is important for us to be aware of what is happening in our world and to try to make a contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I had my own business for 20 years.  I retired in July, 2006, and I now try to spend as much time as possible with my husband, grandchildren and children.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I care!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a women's clothing boutique

lenders.name: Kodi
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in Karma ( my Dogma ain't half bad either! ). This enables me to practice small "p" philanthropy. I also want the Kiva person to know that there are people in the World that care.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in Hospitals providing therapy that a human cannot provide. I have seen incredible results in the people I have worked with. Kiva provides a means for me to help change a person's life from a distance.

lenders.name: Shandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves through running their own business.  I also think this type of support is most helpful to women living in poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher that primarily works with elementary students.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Mike & Mary Jo
lenders.loan_because: A man filled with the love of God, is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I loan to help facilitate principals of self-reliance; to care for ourselves and our families and to find solutions for our own problems.

lenders.name: Federico Sosa Otero
lenders.loan_because:
I am a young Paraguayan professional who wants to help other Paraguayans who lack access to credit. I believe micro finance is an essential tool in alleviating poverty because it provides individuals the opportunity to help themselves, through their own effort,  rather than through handouts by the state or charity, which are all too common here in Paraguay.

I hope to help through my small contributions and by encouraging other Paraguayans to contribute to Kiva.

lenders.name: Christian Finance
lenders.loan_because: I care and because that's what Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I'm just trying to help

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to share with others.

lenders.name: Dale and Jill
lenders.loan_because: We know that we are blessed beyond what we need and it's a priviledge to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: Coffee Distribution business - profits from this business are invested in microenterprise loans.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: We are all on this planet together and I feel we need to help each other as often as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly make a living as a scenic artist and designer for live theatre.

lenders.name: C.J.
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to spare $25 that could help someone else in a great way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Sales and Management and would love to some day return to the Philippines where I once lived, and make it a better place for those who struggle.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage online classes

lenders.name: Shafeen
lenders.loan_because: There are different ways to help people.  In some parts of the world basic necessities such as food, water and shelter are required.  In other parts of the world, it may be something else.  The reason I like the microloan model is because it helps folks become self sustainable. "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day ... teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to be a part of my global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently at the University of Minnesota studying Social Justice and Biology.

lenders.name: Gary & Brenda
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and received help from others when we needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: He helps build aeroplanes. She sells houses.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: With the combined efforts through Kiva we all help make this world a much better place.

lenders.name: Daniel Kauffman
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that microfinancing works wonders to eliminate poverty and help struggling economies. I like to provide the opportunity for those less fortunate to succeed.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an equal chance to succeed in life

lenders.name: Cindee
lenders.loan_because: I care about mother Gaia and the lives she sustains...

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to assist others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day I work for a great company called Proncon MRM Pacific and on the weekends am a civil marriage celebrant in Melbourne who also performs vow renewals, love commitments, house warming, name giving and other ceremonies.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to grow up in a better world for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info:
George Harris is a public policy advocate focused upon community and economic development and international investment.


http://georgeharris.brandyourself.com/

lenders.name: JC Sunglao
lenders.loan_because: I was looking for a mini fridge to buy and thought this was a better use of my money.
lenders.occupational_info: Student in College

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh Ho Chi Minh

lenders.name: Tomas
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to give a helping hand without having a lot of money.

lenders.name: SpeedyMax
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back something
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology System Engineer

lenders.name: Luqman Skye
lenders.occupational_info: computational biology

lenders.name: CIGALE
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help other women make their dreams come true!

lenders.name: Alexa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people working together around the world can create miracles of which government bureaucracies can only dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the tax and finance department of a multinational manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising students critical awareness of their own subjectivity as well as their relationship to wider society.

lenders.name: Damian
lenders.loan_because: There can only be peace when the basic needs are taken care of.  Even though I don't have much there is always enough here in the USA where we can afford to share without manipulating goverments.  Peace be for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently disabled and am getting social security.  I am also investigating means of a bussiness which I can earn a living within the parameters of my temporary disabilities.  I choose to look at my health situation as tempory for I believe in miracles.  I know I am one already.  Peace.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to make something out of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in retail for many years and just recently retired to enjoy life to it's fullest.  I have been very lucky in life and it gives me great pleasure to help others.

lenders.name: kotinka
lenders.loan_because: I've always been lucky enough to have help when I needed it.  I hope others can have that too.
lenders.occupational_info: bl00dy exhausting! being a mum is the hardest job going & the least recognised.  The photo is my youngest son, Michael, covered in muck & wearing his grandad's shoes - so cute!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the hard work of others in dire need of funds to simply run their business to feed their families
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes

lenders.name: Betsey
lenders.loan_because: I am truly fortunate in my life, and would like to help others have opportunities and better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I  teach Health and Physical Fitness to college students.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I am helping someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying life and trying to give a little back =)

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: It important to give back.

lenders.name: Araceli
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a "push-up" vs. a "hand-out".  Those requesting loans are trying to help themselves and their families by WORKING.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupation: Glass bead maker and world gadfly
lenders.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune, make the world a safer place, see smiles smitten
lenders.occupational_info: When I'm not making glass bead jewelry, I'm working to promote interfaith dialogue.  I think that can make the world a more peaceful place.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: God has been so kind to me and my family and I want to help someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a furniture store in a small town in the midwest  . we sell all types of home furnishings .

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are not as fortunate to have the opportunities that we have here in the USA. I think if we give a little no matter how small, It will one day make a difference and help make it a better world to live in. And maybe some day unite and have world peace.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I desperately need to build an addition to my house for my three children.  Please help.
lenders.occupational_info: mom

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to touch people all around the world and to have a positive impact in someone's life.  It is a true privilege for me to assist someone who has the desire and passion to work hard to better their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: Management training and development.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: it's a small amount (dinner out for our family) but can completely change another persons life.  Also, it is such a lift when someone pays off their loan and you know they were able to reach their goal!
lenders.occupational_info: I cut and design vinyl lettering and sayings for walls, window decals and banners. I am also trying to start  "Kelz Hot Dogz" where I will work lunch hours, tournaments and festivals.

lenders.name: Vladik
lenders.loan_because: its necessary.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world.

lenders.name: Tamica
lenders.loan_because: The Lord blesses me continually so it is my desire to be a blessing to someone else.

lenders.name: Antoinette
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.  I do not have much money, but I like to help others who are worse off than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer and handle telephone calls from customers who are having problems with their telephone service.

lenders.name: Maryellen
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help other women so they inturn can help themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two children.  my husband has a job outside the home.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference even if it is a small one which can help one more person.  I want to pass it on!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student going for my elementary education degree so that I can teach young children.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.occupation: former Biotech Co National Sales Mgr
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to be educated and able to contribute to the support of my family, communities, and country.  This is a way to give back worldwide and help other people who are trying to achieve the same goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I was responsible for the sale of  hospital and medical research supplies to scientists in the US who were doing research on the human body and trying to discover new drugs and treatments for patients.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I can identify with the people requesting loans.  I don't have much money to give away and I really like the loan idea.  Helping people help themselves is a great way to do my part in my own small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have a job at the moment.  I'm taking a writing course and spend much of my time training my dogs (I have 8 of them!)  My husband is a carpenter and is very active in his Alcoholics Anonymous group.

lenders.name: Carol M.
lenders.loan_because:
All people deserve an opportunity to make an honest living and should be rewarded for their hard work. 
Eccl 4:9,10

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I dont have much money myself, and I know what it is like to work hard.    I am currently a student, a single mom and I also work part time.  I am now having my third child and was recently diagnosed with a terminal heart condition.  When you give to others, it always is given back to you, maybe not in the same form, it might just be in happiness, however, you have nothing in live of any value if you do not have love and happiness.

lenders.name: www.creditfast.com
lenders.loan_because: With the help of Kiva, our goal is to help people live their dreams and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Credit Fast is a credit card application website. Join our Kiva team, Team CreditFast.com and help deserving people all over the world get credit. http://www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=2275

lenders.name: Lenita
lenders.loan_because: It is very fulfilling to help pull someone from poverty, see someone's dream come true, and to also know that my loan helped make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Maliwan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is very important to give back and to help those in need. I know how important it is for someone to believe in you and what a difference that can make in a person’s life. Each small business loan given out by kiva.org is a piece of hope and relief for the recipient - a chance for them to know they have a support system that wants them to succeed whether it be from across an ocean or right next door. Having the opportunity to give is one of the best gifts in the world.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I have visited Africa twice to help build a school for AIDS orphans - I have seen first hand what each persons donation large or small  can do to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom to 3 boys - 23, 21, and 18. I believe that you teach a child by example. I want them to know the importance of giving back.

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: People need to be able to help themselves.  The world makes it difficult.  I understand the cost of starting a business, and the work involved.  I especially feel for anyone trying to do this as well as raise a family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom of 2, and sort of run a soap making business.  I make soap and lotion in my home.

lenders.name: ANN
lenders.occupational_info: RN

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupation: loves eating at restaurants with homemade foods

lenders.name: jesse and silvia
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change that you want to see in the world"

lenders.name: Irena Rūta
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: When people need to talk but cannot communicate due to the language barrier, I serve as a faithful echo and make the conversation happen.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: Like those I am lending to, I am also an entrepreneur working to support a family. My children are healthy and well-cared for, and I want to share the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to exercise properly and safely, both to improve athletic performance, and to improve overall health and fitness.

lenders.name: Ozlem
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life who is trying to improve their quality of life. I feel blessed to have all that I have in my life and I want to give back to those who are less fortunate than myself. I liked the idea of Kiva since it enables entrepreuners to take the loan to expand their business without the money being used solely as charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company in the information technology department. Basically, I manage the applications that support our marketing organization.

lenders.name: Marty and Bill
lenders.loan_because: in the words of George Eliot, "What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?"

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: God wants us to help each other.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone who is willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain  high pressure boilers and the operation of sky scrapper type buildings in Chicago.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that are trying to improve their life. I have been blessed with a comfortable life and feel I should share.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: If we are fortunate in this life and this world, we have an obligation to support others as we are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct psychological risk evaluations on students who have safe school violations. For example, weapons at school or drug use.

lenders.name: PAUL KOBINA
lenders.loan_because: how do i apply for a loan?
lenders.occupational_info: care for orphanage,street children disables etc

lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: I would like each dollar I loan to stretch and help more people help themselves.

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people who has faith that they can do it, because I am also business women.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is taking care of the customer by doing their clothes I am in dry cleans business.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: After having been afforded the opportunity to experience the generosity and goodwill of honest people around the world, I would like to return their gestures of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a helicopter pilot.

lenders.name: brenda
lenders.loan_because: GOD HAS TRULY BLESSED ME AND I GIVE FROM MY HEART.
lenders.occupational_info: CUSTOMER SERVICE AND I LOVE PEOPLE .  I TRIED TO MAKE ALL CLIENTS TO THE SPA FEEL GOOD, COMFORTABLE AND RELAXED AND ENSURE THEY ENJOY THEIR SERVICES.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.whereabouts: newcastle upon tyne Tyne and Wear
lenders.loan_because: i feel that everyone deserves a chance too help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: i work on an oil rig in the north sea

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: I travel the world constantly being a travel expert and journalist. I find in many occasions, that I want to do more to help the locals, than just with my writings about their locations, and often find I am limited by my own resources. Kiva gives me the oppertunity to reach out and share in my life's good fortune,  by lending a hand to people with adventurous entrepreneurial spirits.
lenders.occupational_info: I am known as Adventure Girl. I am a travel expert who writes about travel and adventure stories for magazines and talk about travel on television shows in America.

lenders.name: B A
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of my money can make a huge impact on someone else's life.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to need a little money to build confidence and get ahead.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I am a senior in college studying business. I hope to own my own business one day, and would like to help others fulfill their dream.

lenders.name: Analiza
lenders.loan_because: i need a money in my online business as affiliiate marketer and seller  of women accessories like bags, I have 5 kids and i want to help my husband
lenders.occupational_info: im selling womens accessories online and a partime affilliate marketer in the internet.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the micro loan concept. Supporting small businesses improves all aspects of the community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses that are in trouble. Their lenders bring me in so they can improve their profits and keep paying back the loans.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: because the borrowers have shown they deserve it by they actions of work ethics, repayment and need

lenders.name: DIANE,ROB,MATT,JORDAN

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: I work with "at-risk" high school aged kids. I aim to support and empower them to improve their lives and achieve happiness and stability.

lenders.name: Joseph Taggart
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped through rough times - now I want to pass it on.

lenders.name: Teresa

lenders.occupational_info: I am working on a Master's degree in Comparative and International Education at Oxford.

lenders.name: Mary

lenders.occupational_info: I handle estates and trusts administration

lenders.name: Alaynelynn
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live where I live.  To have a family who is near me and who loves me.  I have faith in humankind.

lenders.name: Kathy

lenders.occupational_info: I take photos and make custom handmade notecards with them.

lenders.name: Francois
lenders.loan_because: Demonstrated efficiency
lenders.occupational_info: Help people change

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I often need help meeting my own bills and expenses, and many times other people have helped me out. I am delighted to be able to be on the giving end for a change.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist - which doesn't pay my bills, So I also have a job. The job is bathing dogs, and cleaning and doing whatever is necessary to help out at a dog grooming salon.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: The more self-sufficient you become, the more pride and confidence you'll have in yourself. You'll be a positive role model to others and future generations.
lenders.occupational_info: I design  and produce printed communications for a variety of businesses and industries.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a chance to give back to the world that has given me so much.

lenders.name: sherrin

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my children, my home and keep us all healthy and happy,

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in any way possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a cleaning business and I also run a program working with the elderly.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Everybody at one time or another needs a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone self-sufficient.  This is one of the best ways to give back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise testing centers across the state of Arizona (USA) for the AZ Dept. of Education.  We administer the GED test (high school equivalency) and when passed, people can go on to college, get a job, start a business, etc.  Again, making them self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am a business person and I know how hard it is to make a business grow.

lenders.name: Linda Jean
lenders.loan_because: of the stories.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: It really works!

lenders.name: Schyryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: As an analyst/developer, I design, create, customize and support applications that are used by business users like Portfolio Accountants, Traders and Investment Managers. Outside work, I love to spend time with my husband and two wonderful kids.  As a family we love to travel and spend time with our friends.  The Lord has blessed us and we hope that by lending money to entrepreneurs in need we are able to touch their lives even though they live far from us.  I learned that even as low as $25 can go a long way in helping other people.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I have great respect and admiration for hardworking individuals, especially under difficult circumstances.  What a wonderful way to make a difference!

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: It is a way of being "in service"

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: Is a way to say Thank You God for all the daily blessings.
lenders.occupational_info:
Financial Analyst, mother, wife and student.

lenders.name: OWD

lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a dairy farm, where we milk cows and sell the raw milk to a milk factory that produces many things like cheese, sour cream, butter, and powdered milk.

lenders.loan_because: I have visited and volunteered in many of the areas in need of loans and want to continue to help when I'm not physically there.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard working people that deserve a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes drugs to customers when they need it.  I help my company find ways to improve the process and help the customers.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.loan_because: i am called to help others!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: because we all need to live together in this world

lenders.name: Candice

It's just so painful to think of parents not being able to provide life's basic needs for their children.  Why shouldn't I help others who have never had the opportunities that I have had all my life.  I've had to get through difficult times, but nothing in comparison to the obsticles that some of these people have to overcome on a daily basis, just to exist.

lenders.name: Rajan
lenders.loan_because: Would like to see hardworking and honest entrepreneurs achieving their goals in life!

lenders.occupational_info: Plyin' the stormy seas with nay, nuthin' but me heart's compass to guide me through Neptune's wrathful obstacles... arrrrrrrr, but me cutlass is sharp & me hook even keener!

lenders.loan_because: It's sooo fun!  And also because I'm a little bit addicted to this site now...

lenders.occupational_info: I currently stay home and take care of my son.

lenders.loan_because: I care that people get the chance to do something they love.

lenders.name: Bob

lenders.name: Rusty from Alaska
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a change in someone else's life. I am an Alaskan Eskimo and I take my lead from my mother when it comes to building a community.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I work in the hospitality industry but in the past, my work in Alaska was IT support to some of the top world-wide companies. Soon, changes will be coming, I hope you are part of it.

lenders.name: Samantha Selvais
lenders.occupational_info: translator/technical writer

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I know that there are people who will always need help more than I ever will.
lenders.occupational_info: None now. In America, if you are determined,but not really educated that much, when you reach an older age {59} sometimes you are replaced with some one younger. In Michigan, you can be laid off just because ! It is called an "at will" state. The employer does not need a reason.

lenders.name: Alonzo
lenders.loan_because:
I want to sow into people who believe in working for themsleves. 

Proverbs 19:17 
   He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again.

Deuteronmy 28:12
  The LORD shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, and thou shalt not borrow.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy and smart way to help people in an empowering way.

lenders.name: Vũ
lenders.loan_because: trying to slide underneath the pearly gates.
lenders.occupational_info: scientist developing a malaria vaccine

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I am all for helping someone who wants to help themselves make a better life.  The money is not important, but the livelihood is.  I have taught my children that ANYTHING  is possible, and we can all use some help to attain our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I think they already know what it is to be a mother or a health care worker... I am a nurturer and a daughter of God, and my purpose is to do the right thing, and I mean that in all humility.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help others stand on their own.  I can't afford to give large amounts but in this way I still feel that I can help someone accomplish their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from home and type medical reports from doctor's dictations, for hospitals and doctor's offices, that is done over the Internet.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: if every one of us just helped out other people, no matter their race, color, beliefs, or lifestyle the world could become a much happier, decent place and maybe we could all learn to live together instead of destroying each other and our environment.
lenders.occupational_info: I design makeup for theatrical shows, art pieces, etc.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and I want to empower women.

lenders.name: laurie
lenders.loan_because: I have had a chance, now it is time for someone else's chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from my career, but now am raising my young niece.  My work is that of a parent.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: God has given me the gifts to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals that have different disabilities.  I live with them full time and am trying to teach them how to live independently.  It is a very challenging job, but also very rewarding!

lenders.name: Mitchell
lenders.loan_because: I can.  In the film business you spent half your time, simply wondering where the money's going to come from.....and that's just to make a movie.  No one should have to wonder where the money will come from to feed a their family or to have a roof over their heads.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am writer and that's my first love in the industry.  I still read and critique a lot of scripts but lately, I find myself in the role of Producer a lot more and I enjoy the give and take with other film makers.  Being even a small part of seeing to it that someone's project comes together is a pretty rewarding place to be in.

speersml@hotmail.com

http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=61916986

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.

lenders.name: andi
lenders.loan_because: “He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done.”  Proverbs 19:17

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much that I should give in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my last year of medical school, training to care for children and adults.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help our employees when they get ready to retire and what they are entitled to as far as benefits and an annuity.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I respect and admire people who attempt to start their own business, especially in the most difficult of circumstances.  It is very hard work and so very risky.  I feel connected to my lendees and pray for their success.  And I'm deeply moved every time I receive an email alerting me that another payment has been made.  It gives me hope for them and for the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small business making jewelry from sea glass.  Sea Glass is the bits of polished glass that can be found along the shores of lakes and oceans that comes from discarded glass items that have been tossed into the sea.  The glass is pounded by the waves and polished by the sand until it is a beautifully, smooth, "semi-precious" stone.

lenders.name: Jacquelynn
lenders.loan_because: Unlike charitable aid, these microloans actually make a difference for the struggling local economies in which they are given. Just a few dollars from my pocket can make the difference not only for the one person who receives the loan, but ultimately for his family, his neighbors and his country.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop webpages and training materials about technological topics for a university.

lenders.name: Kwabena
lenders.loan_because: To help with the most challenging issue of our society "World Poverty".  Power of Micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: Janitor

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we can change the world and provide for a better future. I have had a heart for Africa almost my entire life..I'm not even sure why. My dream is to one day move to Africa and work in health care as a nurse practitioner.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital diagnosing and treating illness. I help make sick people well through medicine and other treatments. I am also completing my clinical doctorate so that I have even more knowledge to offer my patients.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed enough so that I can.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to want to start a business but not have the money to do it.  I want someone else to have the wonderful feeling of owning something that they are proud of and doing what they love to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Children's clothing and gift sales.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: too little is done for the small businesses around this world. They are often overlooked and under appreciated, though they are what drive communities and impact individuals everyday. I want to help in every way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an engineer, trying to make medical advancements possible. In my spare time I mentor elementary school children in math and science.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's life who is far away.  I've grown up in middle class America, where, on the outside, no one struggles finacially.  I want to give someone else that chance of fiscal stability that I have enjoyed for most of my life.  I will help my brothers and sisters, all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who is going to go to medical school and hopefully be a doctor to the world through organizations like Partners In Health or Doctors Without Borders.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.occupational_info: Fun!

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: "In every community there is work to be done. In every nation there are wounds to heal. In every heart, there is power to do it." -Marianne Williamson
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist and I am hoping to be in dental school within the next few years.

lenders.name: Equipment Controls Co.
lenders.loan_because: Everyone that has the desire and is willing to put forth the effort to succeed, earns the opportunity to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company distributes measurement and control products for natural gas thoughout the United States and Mexico.
